channel.title: Right Click Follow
channel.description:
I have been working for an hour or two now, and I figured I'll just take a chance and ask you guys =). I think I am on the last step until I'm finished. I need the case of the right click follow. It's case 39 for me and when I look at case 39 in my client.java it still says //Right-Click Ban.
I [b]BEG[/b] for one of you to post your follow case here.
I'd really appreciate some help. Thanks

item.description:
@sexytimee wrote:

I was trying to and, I really just fucked up my server, Noone could move… I made backup files before I started and now I’ll just give up and restore everything.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 13, 2008, 07:46:24 PM[/size][hr]And yeah i was trying to add dh40ks I don’t know of any others.
Do you?

item.title: Right Click Follow
item.dc:creator: @sexytimee sexytimee
item.description:
@sexytimee wrote:

Here’s part of it.

[code]outStream.writeByteA(0); // 0 or 1; 1 if command should be placed on
// top in context menu

	outStream.writeString("Trade with");
	outStream.endFrameVarSize();
	outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);

outStream.writeByteC(5); // command slot (does it matter which one?)
outStream.writeByteA(0); // 0 or 1; 0 if command should be placed on top in context menu
outStream.writeString(“Follow”);
outStream.endFrameVarSize();[/code]

And burn, do you have follow in your server, if you have a server?

Read full topic
